title: Looking for reliable flex buddies for chill ranking up alt accounts
body:
Hi there guys!
My friend and I are looking for flex partners to rank up our alt accounts with (alt accounts are currently ranked g5 and s2). Want reliable players that arent prone to league induced rage/panic attacks. rank doesnt matter too much so long as you are deciently compitent at your preferred role and arent too inflexible/ can work around the team. We are looking specifically for ADC, Supp and top lane mains. Most of all we want people who we can have fun playing this awesome game with.
Also.... we want dem quick 5 man flex que times!
Look forward to hearing from you guys!

replies.body: Happy to play. I can do mid, Jungle or Support. Plat 2 or gold 4 in flex, as i don't care that much about flex i care more about solo/duo ladder then i do with the flex queue.

add me
I can skype or discord though im usually silent but am a good listener. I can play all roles except adc to a good standard for my rank as Silver 5. I main Sup and top.
Hey add me, I main ADC was up to silver 1 last season, keen to play
i am g5, add me .. IGN: HorrorFox

Hey I'm a S2 support, but happy to play in whatever role to be in a ranked team.
IGN: sheff27
